long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SearchTimes3 allows users to conveniently select and use up to three search engines simultaneously and compare search results without having to use individual search engines. 

In addition, because SearchTimes3 does not track or collect user behavior data, genuine search results are delivered without the information being skewed in favor of particular products or companies.
